title: Cinefantastique Vol 03 No 3 (Fall 1974)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: An in-depth look at hagsploitation films featuring interviews with Robert Aldrich (What Ever Happened to Baby Jane, Hush Hush Sweet Charlotte), Curtis Harrington (Games, What's the Matter with Helen?, Whoever Slew Auntie Roo), and William Castle (Homicidal, Strait-Jacket). Also includes interviews with George Pal (Doc Savage: Man of Bronze), James B. Harris (Some Call It Loving), and reviews of Andy Warhol's Frankenstein, Don't Look in the Basement, Don't Look Now, Fantastic Planet, Lost Horizon, Westworld, Zardoz and more.
